nodes.name: FluCoMa
nodes.blurb: FluCoMa stands for Fluid Corpus Manipulation. It's all about dealing with large amounts of digital audio.

nodes.name: Signal Decomposition
nodes.blurb: Signal decomposition is about taking digital audio (in real-time or recorded) and breaking it into different things.

nodes.name: Layers
nodes.blurb: One way we can decompose audio is by splitting its spectrum into layers.

nodes.name: Slices
nodes.blurb: One way we can decompose audio is by splitting it in time into slices.

nodes.name: Objects
nodes.blurb: One way we can decompose audio is by trying to find different objects in the spectrum and time.
